EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Compliance Week membership
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Subscription_Contact__c},
Thank you for joining us! As a delegate to a Compliance Week live event, you are automatically enrolled as a Compliance Week member, with unlimited access to complianceweek.com, including:
News & Analysis—Hundreds of articles and weekly updates featuring real-world best practices, opinion, and research; Professional Development—World class conferences and unrestricted on-demand webcast & CPE library; Benchmarking Tools & Research Library.
I will be setting up your new user account. Once activated, you will receive an email to reset your password. If you don't see this email, check your spam folder!
Please contact me for additional information about your benefits, log-in issues or general customer service questions.
Thank you and best regards,
Angela Ruggiero Business Development Associate (617) 570-8605 angela.ruggiero@complianceweek.com
